Properties.Octopus.Action.Script.ScriptBody:
#!/bin/bash

echo "Starting post-deployment health checks..."

# Function to check service health
check_service_health() {
    local service_name=$1
    local health_endpoint=$2
    local max_attempts=30
    local attempt=1
    
    echo "Checking health for $service_name at $health_endpoint"
    
    while [ $attempt -le $max_attempts ]; do
        echo "Attempt $attempt/$max_attempts"
        
        if curl -s -f "$health_endpoint" > /dev/null; then
            echo "‚úÖ $service_name is healthy"
            return 0
        else
            echo "‚ùå $service_name health check failed, retrying in 10 seconds..."
            sleep 10
            ((attempt++))
        fi
    done
    
    echo "‚ùå $service_name failed health checks after $max_attempts attempts"
    return 1
}

# Get load balancer DNS name from CloudFormation outputs
LB_DNS_NAME=$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks \
    --stack-name "poc3-infrastructure-#{Octopus.Environment.Name | ToLower}" \
    --region "#{AWS.Region}" \
    --query "Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey=='LoadBalancerDNS'].OutputValue" \
    --output text)

echo "Load Balancer DNS: $LB_DNS_NAME"

# Check all services
ERRORS=0

# Check Node.js/React service
if ! check_service_health "Node.js/React" "http://$LB_DNS_NAME:3000/health"; then
    ((ERRORS++))
fi

# Check Python FastAPI service
if ! check_service_health "Python FastAPI" "http://$LB_DNS_NAME:8000/health"; then
    ((ERRORS++))
fi

# Check Java Spring Boot service
if ! check_service_health "Java Spring Boot" "http://$LB_DNS_NAME:8080/actuator/health"; then
    ((ERRORS++))
fi

# Check .NET Core service
if ! check_service_health ".NET Core Web API" "http://$LB_DNS_NAME:5000/health"; then
    ((ERRORS++))
fi

# Summary
if [ $ERRORS -eq 0 ]; then
    echo "\nüéâ All services are healthy and ready!"
    echo "\nüìã Service Endpoints:"
    echo "‚Ä¢ Node.js/React: http://$LB_DNS_NAME:3000"
    echo "‚Ä¢ Python FastAPI: http://$LB_DNS_NAME:8000"
    echo "‚Ä¢ Java Spring Boot: http://$LB_DNS_NAME:8080"
    echo "‚Ä¢ .NET Core Web API: http://$LB_DNS_NAME:5000"
else
    echo "\n‚ùå $ERRORS service(s) failed health checks"
    exit 1
fi
